dict.acceptation: 愉快；娱乐；希望；令人高兴的事；
觉得高兴，享受；寻欢作乐；

sent.orig: The pleasure of criticizing robs us the pleasure of being moved by some very fine things.
sent.trans: 批评的快乐剥夺了我们被很好的作品感动的快乐。

sent.orig: Anticipating pleasure is also a pleasure.
sent.trans: 预期快乐本身也是一种快乐。

sent.orig: The great pleasure of ignorance is, after all, the pleasure of asking questions.
sent.trans: 归根结底，无知的极大乐趣即在于提出问题。

sent.orig: I read books as a pleasure, a pleasure.
sent.trans: 我把看书当作一种乐趣、一种享受。

sent.orig: The honest man take pain, and then enjoy pleasure;the knave take pleasure, and then suffer pain.
sent.trans: 君子先苦后甜；人小先甜后苦。
